title: Clear night city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A red car drives slowly on a city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.2 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a city street at night. There are many other cars on the road, some of which are also braking frequently. The street is well-lit with streetlights and neon signs from nearby buildings. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The red car is driving slowly to ensure safety on the road. It frequently brakes to avoid collisions with other vehicles that are also braking frequently. The driver of the red car is being cautious and following traffic rules to ensure a safe journey.
